mapper.select: SELECT ei.dvno, ei.empno, e.name, ac.divname, ac.divcd, dc.departmentname, ei.dvRegDate, de.price, ei.dvappyn, ei.dvappname, ei.dvamt, de.dvmemo, de.dvUseDate, de.detailuse, ei.dvappdate FROM expendInformation AS ei INNER JOIN employee AS e ON ei.empno = e.empno INNER JOIN detailexpend as de ON de.dvno = ei.dvno INNER JOIN accountcode AS ac ON de.divcd = ac.divcd INNER JOIN departmentcode AS dc ON dc.departmentcd = e.departmentcd where ei.dvno = #{dvno}
mapper.insert: insert into erp.expendhistory(dvno, empno, dvamt, dvappdate, dvappname) values (#{dvno}, #{empno}, #{dvamt}, #{dvappdate}, #{dvappname})
mapper.select: select f.fileno, f.filename, f.physicalpath, f.filesize, f.kind, f.relatedpath, f.dno, ei.dvno from erp.expendinformation as ei inner join erp.detailexpend as de on ei.dvno = de.dvno inner join erp.file as f on f.dno = de.dno where ei.dvno = #{dvno}
select IF(COUNT(*) = 1, 1, 0) from erp.expendhistory where dvno = #{dvno}
